Title: Kanban Board Tool
Summary: Lightweight Blazor Kanban board with drag-and-drop.

Title: Draggable Dots
Summary: An interactive polygon drawing tool built with Blazor and JavaScript. Supports dragging vertices, snapping to merge, closing shapes, and live polygon fill rendering.
Content:
The Draggable Dots tool allows you to visually create polygons directly in the browser. Features include:

- Click to add vertices
- Double-click to insert on an edge
- Drag vertices to reposition or merge
- Close polygons by dragging the last vertex onto the first
- Automatically fill closed shapes

Built for speed and simplicity, this is ideal for quick sketching or shape-based UI logic.

Title: Flow Editor
Summary: A lightweight node-based flow editor for designing processes, game logic, or data pipelines with drag-and-drop blocks.
Content:
The Flow Editor tool enables creation of node-based diagrams for workflows, logic chains, or game mechanics.

- Drag-and-drop node creation
- Connect nodes with edges
- Move, delete, or rewire existing nodes
- Custom node shapes and labels

Designed to be modular and data-driven so it can power multiple project types.

Title: Charts Playground
Summary: A custom charting system built from scratch in JavaScript for Blazor, supporting multiple chart types with dynamic data.
Content:
The Charts Playground demonstrates a custom-built charting engine integrated into Blazor.

- Bar, pie, radar, line, gantt, and pareto charts
- Custom colour schemes
- Dynamic data updates
- Fully client-side rendering with no external chart libraries

Perfect for projects where you want full control over chart rendering.
